translations.translation: So destroyed were the Thamud by a storm of thunder and lightning;
Then the Thamud were destroyed by an awesome upheaval;
The Thamuds were destroyed by a violent blast of sound.
So regarding the Thamud, they were destroyed by a terrible scream.
As for Thamud, they were destroyed by the Taghiyah!
Then as to Samood, they were destroyed by an excessively severe punishment.
As for Thamood, they were destroyed by the Screamer;
As for Thamud, they were destroyed by the lightning.
the Thamud were destroyed by a terrible storm of thunder and lightning;
As for Thamud, they were destroyed by the outburst.
As for Thamud, they were destroyed by the Cry.
But the Thamud,- they were destroyed by a terrible Storm of thunder and lightning!
As for Thamud, they were destroyed by the awful cry!
Thamood, they were destroyed by the violent shout (of Gabriel),
As for Thamood, they were annihilated by the Overwhelming.
So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast].
[69:5] As for Thamūd, they were destroyed by the [overwhelming] Roar, an excessively severe cry.

687 (As for Thamud, they were destroyed by the lightning) they were destroyed because of their transgression and idolatry; and it is said that their transgression drove them to disbelieve until they were destroyed.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهْلِكُواْ بِٱلطَّاغِيَةِ } معناه بكفرِهم وطُغيانِهِم ويقال: بالذّنوبِ
 ويقال: بالصَّيحةِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهْلِكُواْ بِٱلطَّاغِيَةِ } [الحاقة: 5] أي: بسبب طغيانهم بالتكذيب المتجاوز عن الحد، أُهلكوا بصيحة هائلة مجاوزة عن حد الصياح
